name: Bloody Blade
desc: The Bloody Blade is the type of sword most commonly made and used in Ravacil. It is a rather small sword with a blade that is just slightly larger that a big kitchen knife.

name: Short Bow
desc: Short Bows are the smallest of all bows. They can be used in a flash which makes them ideal for hunting. However, the small arrows that can be fired from such bows are relatively harmless to anything but small animals and thus they are not too popular in the Arenas.

name: Scrapsuit
desc: Most people would laugh at the notion that a Scrapsuit should be regarded as a suit of armour. Basically, the suit is made from all sorts of waste materials like pieces of leather or wood - only few contain any metal pieces. A Scrapsuit is not very durable since the different types of materials are difficult to fit together. Many a wearer has suddenly found himself without armour as a Scrapsuit fell apart due to a blow from the enemy's weapon and as a result the armour is only used by those who cannot afford better.

name: Snail Shell
desc: Slightly better than a Scrapsuit is the Snail Shell that is made of large pieces of shell that is taken from lake slugs. The armour is rather cumbersome and offers only little room for delicate manoeuvring, but on the other hand it is very cheap.

name: Force Stone
desc: +3 Jegos

name: Hunter Gem
desc: +3 Vikrumo

name: Mage Ring
desc: +3 Intelekto

name: Jaguar Ring
desc: +2 Greicio

name: Minor Relic
desc: +3 Valios

name: Ox Charm
desc: +1 Gyvybiu

name: Luck Ring
desc: +3 Ginybos skillams

name: Mage Eye
desc: +10 Tolimuju kovu burtams

name: Harm Stone
desc: +12 Artimuju kovu skillams

name: Life Pearl
desc: +8 Gydymo burtams

name: Archer Token
desc: +10 Tolimuju kovu skillams

name: Mage Claw
desc: +12 Touch burtams

name: Eagle Eye
desc: +3 Lanku taiklumui

name: Air Boots
desc: +3 Skillu bei burtu i?vengimui

name: Cleric Cross
desc: +3 Skillu bei burtu atremimui

name: Ice Skin
desc: +12% ?alos sugerimui

name: Time Orb
desc: +3 Sekundes tavo naudai ejimo prad?ioje

name: Ice Halo
desc: +10% ?alos sugerimui

name: Longfang
desc: A Longfang sword has a slightly curved blade that is shaped like a big tooth of some large monster. Such blades are often used by the nomads of Vulcor as they are quite handy for cutting through the hide of the desert animals.

name: Fell Blade
desc: These swords have been out of production for quite some years now and they exist in a limited number. They were formerly used by the red masked Executioners that served under the queens in the early years of their reign. Most of the victims that fell to the blades when they were still used for official purposes were sentenced to death because they didn't want to serve in the royal armies.

name: Bone Crusher
desc: Made from the bones of large animals these hammers are more than capable of dishing out damage. Bone Crushers are usually made in Vulcor because the availability of large bones is higher here than anywhere else.

name: Widow Maker
desc: Widow Makers are beautiful hammers that are made by master smiths as a tribute to the art of their craft. The hammers are adorned with delicate runes and small cavities that will produce a low whisper when the weapon is swung. Most of these hammers are made in Blissmor.

name: Spike Axe
desc: Spike Axes are very characteristic weapons that are usually only found in the Arenas or amongst the tribesmen of Vulcor. A Spike Axe is a brutish weapon which has a design more aimed at causing pain rather than harm. Of course, nobody will escape injury if they are subjected to the row of pointy spikes that are fitted onto the axe head instead of a sharp edge.

name: Razor Axe
desc: The art of making a Razor Axe is closely guarded by the few smiths that know how to make them. The special techniques involved result in a super keen edge that cut through most materials with ease.

name: Medium Bow
desc: A Medium Bow is slightly longer than a Short Bow, which makes it possible to fire arrows with greater damage potential. As a result the type of bow is quite popular.

name: Long Bow
desc: Long Bows are slender bows made after the fine traditions of Mystoran hunters. They are the favoured weapon when hunting for the fearsome monsters called Morgulars that dwell within the mighty forest.

name: Blast Stone
desc: Blast Stones are actually small crystals that can be found in caves deep beneath the earth. The crystals may be charged with raw energy which is released if the crystals are shattered.

name: Pain Trap
desc: A Pain Trap is the simplest type of trap and is basically made from a length of tube and a small dart. The dart doesn't cause much harm but since the Pain Trap is easy to rig it is still a very popular choice. The traps are made all over Eidolon and are relatively cheap to buy.

name: Iron Shell
desc: The Iron Shell body armour is based on the same principles as Snail Shell armour. However, the skilled smiths of Orumant have discovered that by using iron instead of slug shells they can make the armour fit the wearer better.

name: Doom Suit
desc: Doom Suits consists of breast and shoulder plates of metal and earned the name because the guards of the Arenas, Doom Guards, favour this type of armour. The suits are mass produced all over the country and are relatively cheap considering the protection they afford.

name: Spike Suit
desc: Spike Suits can be quite a nasty experience to the wearer as the many long spikes may cause harm if a wrong move is made. However, many brave warriors have learned to live with this since the mere appearance of the armour may discourage enemies from attacking.

name: Blood Armour
desc: These rare suits of armour are surrounded by mystery and are banned in many places because they are thought to be linked to some sort of evil. Blood Armour is made from an unknown, blood red material and even today no one knows who made them.

name: Power Mail
desc: Many famous heroes swear to this type of armour. Power Mail is strong, durable and allows for reasonable movement during combat. It consists of many small plates of metal that are fitted together in overlaying layers. The metal used varies from region to region but the smiths of Blissmor are probably the best at making Power Mail.

name: Bull Armour
desc: Bull Armour is fashioned from thick metal plate and comes with a great helmet shaped like the head of a bull, hence the name. Skilled warriors have learned to use the big horns on the helmet as brute weapons in the wars against intruders.

name: Trollskin
desc: Hides from forest trolls are quite useful for making armour as they are very tough. Getting the hides for the armour is just as tough, however, as troll rarely want to part with their skin!

name: Ice Armour
desc: The name is quite misleading as Ice Armour isn't made from ice but cold steel.

name: Lava Plate
desc: The hardened lava of Vulcor volcanos can be made into plates of hard armour.

name: Black Mail
desc: We are not talking about crime now but a suit of black armour worn by many warriors.

name: Paladin Suit
desc: Bright and shiny this is the suit of armour for those that need to think about their image.

name: Chaos Plate
desc: The twisted metal and strange shape of these suits have earned them their name.

name: Vulcor Suit
desc: Heavy armour is not seen often in the region of Vulcor as it is simply too hot to wear in the relentless wastes of the desert. A Vulcor Suit is one of the few that are popular, though.

name: Wraith Mail
desc: The light material used for these suits makes the armour look transparent.

name: Holy Plate
desc: Suits of Holy Plate are highly prized by Heroes as they are blessed by gods.

name: Lizard Sword
desc: Lizard Swords come in many shapes and sizes but what distinguishes them from other swords is that they are always coated with lizard venom taken from the giant lizards that can be found in the mountains of Blissmor.

name: Giant Sword
desc: The name of this type of weapon reflects the sheer size of it. Most Giant Swords are longer than a tall man and it takes great strength to wield them properly. However, once a hero has learned how to use a Giant Swords he or she becomes a truly dangerous foe! There is no secret behind the invention of Giant swords

name: Ghost Sword
desc: Ghost swords are very rare and are as such collector items. Once one of these weapons surfaces it will usually end up in a store and be sold to a hefty price. The swords all come from Mystor and it is said that they must be created in the ancient Stone Circles of the forest. On more than one occasion the victim of a Ghost Sword has simply vanished when killed by the weapon. This has resulted in the common belief that these weapons can turn people into ghosts, but this is still to be proven.

name: Doom Hammer
desc: Doom Hammers are large and clumsy to wield but the damage they cause more than compensates for this. Upon impact with any hard surface, be it a rock or the head of a person, a Doom Hammer will emit a loud thundering noise which is how they earned their name. These weapons are only manufactured by a few smiths that reside in the depths of the mountains of Blissmor.

name: Cleaverhead
desc: If the axe can cleave a large tree then it should also be able to cleave a skull. At least that was what a group of foresters thought when they decided to use their tools against their enemies when they were attacked in Mystor. Since then the large bladed type of axe has become more and more popular with gladiators in the Arenas and the foresters have now been proven right.

name: Inferno Axe
desc: Inferno Axes are made from a special material that the wizards of Orumant invented some years ago. The material is comprised of many elements, including lava rock from Vulcor, which creates intense heat. The weapons are therefore not easy to carry around and as a result they are usually used in the Arenas or in great battles.

name: Toe Twister
desc: The Toe Twister trap is based on a short length of wire that is placed on the ground and concealed in some way. When the trap is triggered the wire will tighten around whatever triggered it. The device is a typical example of how a thing that was originally invented for hunting has been adopted for warfare.

name: Foot Mincer
desc: A Foot Mincer is a trap that requires some time to set up. It is a rather large construction that mainly consists of two metal jaws that shut tight when triggered. The traps are also used for hunting but many shun them as they are considered too brutal.

name: Body Blaster
desc: Although this kind of trap is not magical in nature it is only powerful wizards who know how to make it since it requires great knowledge of alchemical ingredients. When the trap is triggered a spray of strong acid is released at the unfortunate victim. The acid causes terrible burns and as a result Body Blasters are only allowed in the Arenas where people are magically restored to full health after fights.

name: Ghost Bow
desc: Ghost Bows are ancient weapons that were long ago used in an epic battle that would decide the fate of Eidolon. Now the rare weapons are said to hold the spirits of the fallen warriors of that battle. For that reason many shun the bows, fearing that they might be evil.

name: Heavy Bow
desc: Heavy Bows are made from solid hardwood trees and are quite heavy, requiring some strength to use. All Heavy Bows are made in Mystor but since they are very popular they can be bought everywhere in Eidolon.

name: Bolt Bow
desc: The type of ammunition used for Bolt Bows is very thick and strong bolt-like arrows that are capable of penetrating even steel. They were invented to counter some of the heavier kinds of armour but now they are used for practically all purposes. Their high damage potential makes up for their slow rate of fire.

name: Fire Bow
desc: Fire Bows are an excellent example of how the various regions of Eidolon work together to ensure maximum efficiency and prosperity. The bows are made from Vulcan steel that is particularly resilient to heat and fire. This is important because the incendiary arrows that are used with the bows generate a lot of heat. The arrows are made in Blissmor and are based on the same principles as Lava Bombs

name: Giant Bow
desc: Although a Giant Bow is quite large the name of the weapon is rather a result of the use of giant hair as strings. Only few true giants still roam Eidolon and these are viciously hunted for the durable material that their hair is.

name: Steel Shell
desc: A Steel Shell bomb is based on Blast Stones. Several of the energy-charged crystals are placed in a small steel container which is constructed so as to easily break all the crystals at once if the bomb is thrown onto a hard surface. Needless to say these bombs must be handled with utmost care.

name: Egg Bomb
desc: Egg Bombs were originally invented by a clever hunter that wanted to find an easier way to kill the large birds called Glibbars than to shoot arrows at them. He came up with the idea of making a bomb that looked like a Glibbar egg. The bomb was placed in an empty nest and when one of the large birds returned to hatch the eggs the bomb would go off. These days the bombs are mostly used in the Arenas but some still use them to hunt Glibbars.

name: Lava Bomb
desc: The skill required to make a Lava Bomb is not something that many possess. Many foolishly think they know just how to accumulate the hot lave that is needed for these bombs but most end up dead in the volcanoes of Vulcor. It is even said that the ancient dragons that once roamed Eidolon used to favour the hot lave for drinks.

name: Fiery Oil
desc: Fiery Oil is a special liquid that is made by wizards of Orumant. The elements of the oil make it very sticky which is ideal for causing maximum damage to enemies. On the downside the oil is very unstable and the slightest friction may cause it to burst into flames.

name: Liquid Fire
desc: Liquid Fire is actually molten metal that is kept in a heated container. When the bomb hits a surface with some force the container breaks, spilling out the burning metal. This is very painful, especially when the hardened metal has to be removed from the body, which usually causes the skin to be peeled off as well!

name: Fire Bomb
desc: These bombs are the peak of innovation in terms of what can be done with fire. Fire Bombs have evolved from Fiery Oil but instead of oil they are based on plasma which is almost impossible to put out once lit. Also, the plasma is not as unstable as Fiery Oil, which makes it far safer to use. However, it is much more expensive to produce.

name: Corrupter
desc: These blades have a reputation of turning people into criminals. Are you interested?

name: Duoblade
desc: This exotic sword actually has two blades and look more like a huge claw.

name: Slayer Blade
desc: Monster hunters from Mystor swear to this long and slender sword.

name: Foul Basher
desc: Formerly used for pest control these hammers are now popular in the Arena.

name: Skullhammer
desc: The head of this hammer is one large skull taken from any kind of monster.

name: Chaos Sledge
desc: Get a suit of Chaos Armour too and you will look like you mean business!

name: Brutalis
desc: Many Vulcor Clans favour this brutal weapon only for the visual effect.

name: Twin Axe
desc: This weapon is more or less a long shaft with axe heads in both ends.

name: Rustaxe
desc: The secret behind Rustaxes is simply that the metal is rusty ...surprise!

name: Dark Reaper
desc: The Dark Reaper axe features a long curving head that looks like the blade of a scythe.

name: Skulltrap
desc: Skulltraps are bizarre contraptions that are based around putting explosive devices into human or animal skulls. When they are triggered they will blast fragments of bone in a wide radius.

name: Jaws of Pain
desc: The design is taken from the typical bear trap that features big metal jaws.

name: Crystaltrap
desc: People often mistake this trap for being some kind of valuable. Most are dead!

name: Mutilator
desc: As an example of true vickedness this trap will wound rather that kill the foe.

name: Haunter
desc: The arrows fired from this bow emit a shivering sound...like ghosts!

name: Eyepiercer
desc: This light bow is perfect for fast and accurate shots e.g. Taking out an eye or two.

name: Striker
desc: This advanced bow is actually very easy to use and requires little skill of the user.

name: Doombow
desc: Oh boy is this a slow bow. But just wait till you see the carnage it can cause!

name: Spikebomb
desc: When these bombs explode it looks like porcupines being blown up.

name: Darkfire
desc: These bombs are filled with foul Darkfire that can burn through almost anything.

name: Groundshaker
desc: This heavy bomb is very stable and is often used for blasting large areas.

name: Wallbuster
desc: Being invented for demolition purposes these bombs pack a great punch. Speed: Damage: Weight: Req: Cost:

name: Smasher
desc: The hammer head of a Smasher is no larger than a child's fist but if used properly it can still be quite effective. They are cheap and easy to make and can be bought anywhere in Eidolon.

name: Beheader Axe
desc: Just like Fell Blades these axes were invented for the purpose of executions. It was soon discovered that Fell Blades were not good enough for the job ? it would often take several strikes to cut off a person's head which was found to be too cruel. Beheader Axes, however, fully live up to their name and will always chop off a head in the first try...at least if the executioner is half decent. The axes are no longer made but because they were originally produced in such great numbers they can still be bought.

name: Black Axe
desc: The heads of Black Axes have been burned in the fire of volcanoes for decades, giving the metal a pitch black surface. When the metal has been shaped into its final form and is cooled down it becomes very hard and is almost unbreakable. These axes are often favoured by more shady people that don't want to be spotted at night.

name: Leg Ripper
desc: The Leg Ripper has gotten its name from the small but vicious monster that is used for the trap. Leg Rippers live in the wastelands of Vulcor and hunt by lying in wait for prey buried under the sand. When something steps near the monster's hiding place it shoots out and tears into the victim, often ripping off a leg.

name: Heartcutter
desc: A nasty little thing this is! The small blade is designed to cut out the foe's heart.

name: Soulcrusher
desc: This evil hammer shouldn't be taken lightly as it can destroy souls.

name: Souldevourer
desc: Some say that these ancient axes can eat a man's soul if they hit just right.

name: Demolisher
desc: I tell you, don't be the one to trigger this trap! It will litterally tear you apart.

name: Unequip Bomb
desc: Unequip bomb.

name: Unequip Trap
desc: Unequip trap.
